definition: to have a high temperature (from illness)/to have a fever
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
to burn/to cook/to stew/to bake/to roast/to heat/to boil (tea, water etc)/fever/to run a temperature/(coll.) to let things go to one's head

sentences.english: Dehydration and fever can be treated with oral rehydration salts and paracetamol.
sentences.chinese: 脱水和发烧可用口服补液盐和对乙酰氨基酚进行治疗。

sentences.english: Just prepare another round, whenever your fever acts up again.
sentences.chinese: 无论何时你又发烧了，只要再准备一份姜茶。

sentences.english: The patient has a mild fever.
sentences.chinese: 那个病人有些轻微的发烧。

sentences.english: You may go back to the hotel so long as your fever allays .
sentences.chinese: 不用住院，只要不发烧，就可以回去。

sentences.english: Minor fevers or infections will develop if you're over-stressed.
sentences.chinese: 要是压力过大的话，你会有点发烧，或是被感染。

sentences.english: Fever and fussiness without an apparent cause may result from UTI.
sentences.chinese: 发烧或无明显原因的生气可能是泌尿道感染所致。

sentences.english: He has fallen ell and suffered fever for a week.
sentences.chinese: 他得病并且发烧已有一个星期了。

sentences.english: E. g. Many hardcore players do not consider themselves hardcore.
sentences.chinese: 许多游戏发烧友并不认为他们很发烧。

sentences.english: E. g. Many hardcore players do not consider themselves hardcore.
sentences.chinese: 许多游戏发烧友并不认为他们很发烧。

sentences.english: Symptoms include fever and muscle aches, often with other gastrointestinal symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 病症包括发烧和肌肉疼痛，常伴有其他肠胃病的症状。

sentences.english: With immediate treatment, the fever may prove nonfatal.
sentences.chinese: 要是马上治疗的话，发烧不会危及到生命。

sentences.english: Anti-tuberculous therapy was given and the patient became afebrile.
sentences.chinese: 病人在给予抗结核药物治疗后，发烧情形改善。

sentences.english: They have not understood a word of his fevered reply.
sentences.chinese: 他们不理解一个词，他发烧的答复。

sentences.english: Less-common side effects include fever, vomiting, and diarrhea.
sentences.chinese: 较少见的副作用包括发烧，呕吐，腹泻。

sentences.english: Homebred now have a fever has been acoustics compared that?
sentences.chinese: 现在国产发烧音响那个比较好一点？
